name: places/ChIJR5Gwwb9ZwokRg9CWHb7jcYc
formattedAddress: 13 Gansevoort St, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 13 Gansevoort St, New York, NY 10014, USA

editorialSummary.text: Custom-built gym for innovative group weight-training sessions featuring dumbbell & core exercises.

originalText.text: Liftonic has some of the best strength training classes in the city! I really love being able to just follow along and get in a great workout without having to plan it myself. The instructors are all really encouraging and friendly, and their customer service around buying classes is great. Highly recommend if you want to get into weight lifting, or already have some experience but just want a tough workout without thinking too much about it.

originalText.text: Liftonic is amazing! I try to make it between 2-4 times a week. All the instructors are thorough, fun and personable. If you are thinking about strength training, try it out here! I started well into my 40s and the results are awesome. I see a difference and most importantly feel a difference!

text.text: Liftonic is amazing! I try to make it between 2-4 times a week. All the instructors are thorough, fun and personable. If you are thinking about strength training, try it out here! I started well into my 40s and the results are awesome. I see a difference and most importantly feel a difference!

originalText.text:
Bruh, do you even lift? If you don't go to Liftonic, I doubt it. Group weight training is going to be the next craze. I don't think NYC realizes what a monster this place is.

This is the most underrated, yet effective fitness class in NYC. Weightlifting has never been as intensive yet fun. The lighting is perfect, the exercises are simple, and the movements are super slow. Radan / the trainers will guide you every step of the way using creative dumbell / bodyweight exercises.

As a result, using even a lighter weight will make you super sore. And for women worried about bulking up, don't worry, it won't happen. You don't just magically wake up one day looking like Arnold. And if you do, stop lifting.

The leg/butt day here is the best lower body workout in the city. Across 6-7 exercises, you will work out your butt in ways you or your therapist didn't even think possible. Get ready to be sore for a few days.

Each day is a different muscle group. I highly recommend coming before this place gets discovered by the people in Murray Hill.

originalText.text: I love this place! And Rachel is so amazing she really is motivating and so bad a**! Can't wait to head back and get those gains!

text.text: I love this place! And Rachel is so amazing she really is motivating and so bad a**! Can't wait to head back and get those gains!

originalText.text: innovative and low key studio for weight lifting classes in a group environment. Nicely spaced out benches and plenty of weights. Instructor gets projected on multiple tv screens in case your class is full. We had a trial class with Radan who not only knew his stuff but corrected everyone to maintain their best form to get the exercises right. There’s music, lockers, and a couple of changing rooms. Nice atmosphere in this subterranean space and location is very convenient for various subway train
